abstract.t: This document describes a way for an Internet connected device to forward/proxy received Broadcast Remote ID into UAS Traffic Management (UTM). This is done through a Supplemental Data Service Provider (SDSP) that takes Broadcast Remote ID in from Finder and provides an aggregated view using Network Remote ID data models and protocols. This enables more comprehensive situational awareness and reporting of Unmanned Aircraft (UA) in a "crowd sourced" manner.
